dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1968
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reflects on her recent reading--about priests witnessing in prison, especially the Berrigan brothers whom she admires. Comments also on essays about the Civil War and the freedom struggle of blacks.
